亙.definition: extending all the way across; running all the way through

亙古.definition: throughout time; from ancient times (up to the present)

亙古不變.definition: unchanging since times immemorial (idiom); unalterable; unvarying; monotonous

亙古未有.definition: unprecedented; never seen since ancient times

亙古通今.definition: from ancient times up to now; throughout history
